import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class UploadDocuments2 extends Component { state = { alesReq: null, sgk: null, experience: null, ALESResult: null, englishExamResult: null, referenceLetter: null, referenceLetter2: null, statementOfPurpose: null, ALESResultInput: null, experinceInput: null, passport: null, passportInput: null, permissionLetter: null, permissionLetterInput: null, mastersTranscriptInput: null, }; handlechange = (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const value = target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value, }); }; //If applicant applis with ALES, then the Ales Result is needed from the applicant ALESReqHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { this.setState({ ALESResultInput: (

ALES result file

), }); } else { this.setState({ ALESResultInput: (

I have at least 1250 days of working experience documented by the relevant government body (in Turkey, SGK)

Yes
No
), }); } }; //If applicant is experienced, than the Working experience document is wanted from user experienceHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { this.setState({ experinceInput: (

Working Experience Document

), }); } else { this.setState({ experinceInput: null }); } }; submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const payload = { alesReq: this.state.alesReq, sgk: this.state.sgk, }; await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/accounts/register", method: "POST", data: payload, }) .then( (response) => ( this.setState({ datas: response }), alert(response.data.message) ) ) .catch(() => console.log("Register Başarısız")); }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const file = target.files[0]; await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", method: "POST", headers: { // Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token") Authorization: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Y9Kt_w2oQkuVHBpcC2jbBK8SzYqXAIPRGuVzKGJtH34", }, body: { title: name, document: file, }, }) .then((response) => console.log(response.success)) .catch(() => console.log("Upload Başarısız")); }; render() { return (

Step 2 / 4

Ales Requirements

{this.state.ALESResultInput} {this.state.experinceInput}

Are you applying with ALES requirements ?
Yes

); } }
